<template>
     <van-button
    :icon="value ? 'star' : 'star-o'"
    :class="{ collored: value }"
    @click="onShoucang"
    :loading="loading"
  ></van-button>
      <van-icon color="#777" name="star-o" />
</template>

<script>
import {addShoucang,delShoucang } from "@/api/users"
export default {
    name:"collected-btn"
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
